phrs.translation: 土生动植物, 当地人
原住民德语, 原住民

sentences.sentence: Fortunately he soon made friends with an old indigene.
sentences.translation: 幸运的是，他很快就和一个土著老人交上了朋友。

sentences.sentence: When area of forests reduced, indigene had more farmland to raise more individuals.
sentences.translation: 随着当地森林的减少，增加了更多的农业用地，养活了更多的人口；

sentences.sentence: Sun was one of the most important symbols for man and was worshiped in many indigene cultures as God.
sentences.translation: 太阳是人类最重要的图腾标志，被许多当地文化崇拜为神。
